pages.text: $(li)Embodies are hostile creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/soul_sand_valley)Soul Sand Valley$(/l) of The Nether.$(br)$(li)They will attack $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeletons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/piglin)Piglin$(/l) and you too.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/infernalexp/soul_salt_clump)Soul Salt Clumps$(/l) upon death.
